Sentencas: Hydrogen-water are the primary reactant-product pair in the fuel electrode of reversible solid oxide cells.
Titulo: Mechanism of rate-limiting step switchover for reversible solid oxide cells in H2/H2O atmosphere

Sentencas: A different dependence of polarization resistance on pH(2)O in fuel cell and electrolysis modes has been proven experimentally, revealing different rate-limiting steps in fuel electrodes in these two modes.
Titulo: Mechanism of rate-limiting step switchover for reversible solid oxide cells in H2/H2O atmosphere

Sentencas: Despite extensive studies on solid oxide fuel cells or solid oxide electrolysis cells, existing literature is still hard to interpret this phenomenon.
Titulo: Mechanism of rate-limiting step switchover for reversible solid oxide cells in H2/H2O atmosphere

Sentencas: To understand the reaction mechanism of reversible solid oxide cells in H-2/H2O atmosphere during current direction switch, we develop an elementary reaction mechanistic model of a nickel-patterned electrode button cell coupling charge transfer reactions, surface heterogeneous chemical reactions, and surface diffusion.
Titulo: Mechanism of rate-limiting step switchover for reversible solid oxide cells in H2/H2O atmosphere

Sentencas: We use a two-step hydrogen spillover mechanism, i.e., H(Ni)+O2- (YSZ) <-> (Ni) +OH- (YSZ) +e(-) and H(Ni)+OH- (YSZ) <-> (Ni)+H2O(YSZ)+e(-), to describe charge transfer reactions.
Titulo: Mechanism of rate-limiting step switchover for reversible solid oxide cells in H2/H2O atmosphere

Sentencas: This model can well interpret this phenomenon, and further, reveal the inherent relationship between the operating condition and cell performance.
Titulo: Mechanism of rate-limiting step switchover for reversible solid oxide cells in H2/H2O atmosphere

Sentencas: Model calculation reveals that the limitation of OH-(YSZ) surface coverage (<1%) results that the charge transfer reaction generating OH-(YSZ) dominates electrochemical reaction rate no matter which mode a cell operates.
Titulo: Mechanism of rate-limiting step switchover for reversible solid oxide cells in H2/H2O atmosphere

Sentencas: To enhance the electrochemical performance of fuel electrode, it is the key to understand how to enhance the surface concentration of OH-(YSZ).
Titulo: Mechanism of rate-limiting step switchover for reversible solid oxide cells in H2/H2O atmosphere
